Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Racine
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Racine, Diversey, Cannon Drive and Lakeshore West (Nature Museum) due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/47th
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove, X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 47th, Drexel & 43rd due to street blockage at Cottage Grove/45th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove, #X4 Cottage Grove Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 47th, Drexel and 43rd due to street blockage at Cottage Grove/45th.

Allow extra travel time.
